message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs. This exceptional item is worth more than $1200000 to us, but I am confident it will be an invaluable asset to you. Let's start by discussing a fair price. Would you consider purchasing the product for $1500000?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
